law.catch_line: To qualify for a beauty salon permit, an applicant shall meet the requirements of this section....

text.section: To qualify for a beauty salon permit, an applicant shall meet the requirements of this section.
An applicant shall own or lease the beauty salon for which the application is made.
As a condition of the issuance of a beauty salon permit, the beauty salon for which the application is made shall pass the inspection conducted under § 5-520 of this subtitle.
The applicant shall meet any other requirements that the Board sets, by regulation, for applicants for beauty salon permits.
